Package hu.klenium.tetris.view

Platform-specific views for models, they display data of other objects.
JavaFX is used for window management and drawing.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardCell
    Board cells might store one part of a fallen tetromino.
    BoardView
    View of the board's data: when it's updated, this view displays it again.
    CanvasView
    Helper class for using a JavaFX canvas.
    SquareView
    A simple, general view class that draws just a filled square to a canvas.
    TetrominoView
    View of the falling tetromino: when the data is updated, its parts are displayed again.
